settings.directConversion: Convert directly to rem (16px â†’ 1rem instead of rem(16))
settings.minValue: Minimum px value to convert (e.g., 4 to skip 1-3px)
settings.maxValue: Maximum px value to convert (e.g., 999 to skip large values like 1920px)
settings.includeProperties: Convert only these properties (e.g., ['font-size', 'padding', 'margin']). Empty = all.
settings.keepPxInRem: Keep px unit in rem() (rem(10px) instead of rem(10))
settings.scssInterpolation: Use SCSS interpolation in calc() (#{rem(10)} instead of rem(10))
settings.enableDiagnostics: Show warnings for px values (underlines px values)
settings.enableCodeLens: Show 'Convert' buttons above lines with px values
settings.excludeFiles: Glob patterns for files to ignore (e.g., '**/*.min.css', '**/vendor/**')
settings.fileTypes: File types to consider in batch conversion
